The
               
              dead
               
              with
               
              charity
               
              enclosed
               
              in
               
              clay
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
And
               
              then
               
              to
               
              Calais
              ,
               
              and
               
              to
               
              England
               
              then
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Where
               
              ne’er
               
              from
               
              France
               
              arrived
               
              more
               
              happy
               
              men
              .
